commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It's over... It's finally, actually over this time.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It was a long, arduous battle. Now we're free.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I've still got vocab words floating around in my head. I'm gonna go to sleep so they don't disappear. Zzz...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Go, went, going... Buy, bought, buying...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm starving!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I feel like I've done a lifetime of studying in this past week.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah. I think I deserve to pat myself on the back.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You did such a good job, Kasumi. *Pat* *Pat*

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Th-Thanks, Shizuko.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I don't want to study for a while now.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great job, everyone. All that's left now is to wait for our results.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I don't even want to know how I did. I'm way too scared.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You studied a lot, so you'll be fine.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I think my grades will be better than usual thanks to the study sessions, but I've never felt good about my exams.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You've given it everything you've got, so I'm sure your grades will be great.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You think mine will be too?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course they will! All of us tried our hardest, so there's no way we're gonna get bad grades here.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Hearing it from you really makes it feel true.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah, I feel like things will turn out all right.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Now, now, enough with the study talk! Let's all go hang out together!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That sounds like a great idea! I want to throw off my shackles and reward myself!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Going out with all of you sounds like it would be a great time.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah, it does!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Then I think that settles it.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Stop! I said, stop! STOP!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh? What's wrong, Ai? Exams are over! You don't have to do the drill sergeant thing anymore!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Don't tell me you think the end of the exams spells the end of everything.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It doesn't?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You need to evaluate yourself and review the areas you failed. There's no point in all of that studying if you don't commit everything to knowledge.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: She's right. Even if we got the score we were aiming for this time, it'll mean nothing if our grades drop on our next exams.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's a good point. It's probably best to keep our grades up while Mifune monitors us.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Do you really want to let all of your painstaking studies go to waste by forgetting everything? You'll totally lose out if you don't keep that knowledge.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: So that's how a grade-A student thinks.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You'll be doing yourself a favor by remembering everything.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: In what way?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Well, you'll always be able to use that knowledge once you memorize it, right? It'd be a pain to have to learn it all over again, don't you think?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eek! Having to start from scratch would mean going through that nightmare again! I can't handle that!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Persistence pays off. In acting, you discover what needs improvement through constant practice, which allows you to deepen your understanding of your role and make it your own.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: This also applies to studying...and really all sorts of other things too. You're not doing yourself any favors by preventing yourself from growing and developing.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Okay, fine, I get it. I'm not about to throw a tantrum over it. We just have to stick around, right?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aww, does that mean we're not going out?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: No one said we weren't.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hm?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: She's saying we should all go and hang out after we've finished studying!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Really?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm not THAT much of a monster! C'mon, you've all been working your little tails off!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It's all thanks to you all taking the time to look over our studies! Thank you so very much!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: C-Come on, Shizuku! You're making me blush! Seriously, don't mention it! More importantly, let's give it one last push so we can treat ourselves for it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah! We'll grade ourselves, review, and then let our hair down after that!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well in that case, let's hurry up and get started! We gotta get this over with so we can play our hearts out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hahaha, you're so calculating, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Okay everyone, get your exam papers out.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Make sure you ask someone if you come across a bit you don't understand. Don't just ignore it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're so reliable! I'm glad I invited you to join the club, Ai.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Man, what's with you all? Ahaha!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You have the power to pull everyone along with you, which is an important power for a school idol to have as well.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, stop! You're killing me! Besides, someone had to drag you along or you'd be dragged into make-up exams!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Hahaha!
